title: Dollar Dash RePack By R.G Mechanics NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:
Year : 2013

Publisher : Kalypso Media

 Processor : ntel Pentium IV processor with a clock frequency of 1.7 GHz
> Memory : 1 GB
 Video : 128 MB of memory, support for DirectX 9.0
 Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
 Free space on hard disk : 550 MB

Description :
  The game is a arcade game in which you will be able to try their hand at the role of the robber. Its main purpose - to steal as much money to furnish all opponents and get to the nearest ATM. Funds obtained by criminal means he spends on new skills, customization, upgrades, and many other equally useful things. Multiplayer is designed for 4 people. Total has 3 game modes in which the user will be able to defend themselves (Save the Safe), attack (Dollar Dash) or overtake their competitors (Hit'n'Run), using a unique, and sometimes comical tactics. Graphics beaten in the best traditions of cartoon-style that makes the gameplay is not only fun, but also incredibly fun.
